game.title: Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the forgotten temple
game.description: You have been chosen to venture into the forgotten temple and retrieve an ancient and powerful artifact rumored to have went missing centuries ago. Beware, the temple is full of deadly traps and fearsome guardians.

task.description: Refer to the old map provided by the quest giver and locate the entrance to the temple.

task.objective: Solve the riddle of the stone door
task.description: Crack the riddle embedded on the stone door to gain access into the temple's interior.
Overcome the temple guards and traps to reach the inner sanctum and secure the artifact.
